caption: Got it tonight using grub hub and everything was perfection! We got the shrimp spring rolls and they were yummy and fresh! The broth was very hot which was perfect! They also made our order perfect to the customizations we had made! Fresh and fast! We will be back!!!😁
I got the vegetarian Pho and it was so good. Hit the spot in this cloudy day.

How do you have all these PHO restaurant’s that claims to have vegetarian PHO but under the Description is always says made with beef broth?  🤦🏽‍♀️ Make it make sense please! Thank you It’s PHO Girls for making REAL Vegetarian PHO with …
